data.title: Outstanding Sandwich!
data.text: Found this place by accident but I am glad that I did.  The sandwiches are made to order and are hot.  The staff is fantastic albeit very busy during the lunch hour.  There is not a lot of seating so you may have to go elsewhere to eat your sandwich but the food is really, really good.

data.title: Delish Sandwiches
data.text: Don't let the decor think you are getting a plain sandwich, the made to order sandwiches are very good with lots of great toppings. For first timers, get their name sake and then branch out.

data.title: Order ahead
data.text:
Arrived at 1230 on Friday. Minimal line waiting to order but phone and fax orders coming in non stop. 

Ordered to go at 1235pm.

Small shop with only a few tables plus a window bar.

Very busy noisy atmosphere.

They did not have enough help and sandwiches were stacking up coming out of the oven.

The same knife was used to cut all sandwiches 😕

Sandwich and salad were ready at 12:54pm.

The salad and sandwich were ok.

data.title: Best sandwich in Broomfield, possibly all of Denver
data.text:
Seriously good sandwiches.  Great bread, top notch meats, delicious.  Lots of vegetarian options.

Tiny place, super packed at lunch.  Call ahead.

data.title: Best Sandwiches in Broomfield
data.text: Doesn't look like much from the outside or inside but the sandwiches are amazing and not very expensive. Staff is great and always nice. I just wish they were open later so I could get there in time for a dinner run.

data.title: Fantastic Deli
data.text:
I've been to Big Dog Deli about once a week for 2 years and have always enjoyed a great sandwich. They toast the bread perfectly to get a nice, crunchy exterior and soft interior. Great fillings make it even better, all at a very reasonable price.

The interior isn't much to look at, and there aren't enough tables, but if you're looking for a solid sandwich, this is the place to go.

data.title: Best....sandwich....ever!!!
data.text: This place is unique to say the least. They have so many great sandwiches that it is hard to choose. My wife and I usually split a vegetarian sandwich of some type with all the fixins. We often settle on the Pointer (mushrooms & swiss) but you really can't go wrong with anything you choose. The staff is always friendly and fast, and we have never been disappointed with our sandwich!

data.title: Great and cheap subs - well worth it!
data.text:
A local institution, Big Dog Deli is a great place for subs and sandwiches. I got the Big Dog Sub, which was juicy prime rib. Extremely tasty and great value at around $7.00 including a drink. 

It is obvious the team know what they are doing, and are keen to keep their customers happy. Keep up the great work!
